original_text: And the disciples said to him, “Where are we to get enough bread in such a desolate place to feed so great a crowd?”
korean_text: 제자들이 이르되 광야에 있어 우리가 어디서 이런 무리가 배부를 만큼 떡을 얻으리이까

sentences.original_text: And the disciples said to him
“Where are we to get enough bread
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 어디서 그만큼의 빵을 구해야 합니까

sentences.original_text: to feed so great a crowd?”
